name: Om Nom Blitz
description:
Made for Ludumdare #33

Check out the Ludumdare Page here

A 2 player game. Fullscreen recommended

Eat more of your color Noms than the other player to win! Use the Blitz Ball to block the other player and to deflect their Noms!

Pink Player: Move - WSAD / D-Pad Blitz Ball - V / A

Yellow Player: Move - Arrows / DPad Blitz Ball - Space / A
